name: snugly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that feels warm, comfortable, and protected: She's curled up snugly in the armchair, reading a book. She tucked patients snugly in their beds like a loving grandmother.
in a way that fits closely: If we put the washing machine over there, the fridge will fit snugly into this space. The straps of the seat must fit snugly to protect the baby. See
snug
More examplesFewer examplesHe reached for the quilt and wrapped it snugly around her. His overcoat fitted him snugly and his hat was set firmly and squarely on his smooth hair. The helmet should fit snugly and securely.
